name: Aeroplane Parking Game 2018
description:
Welcome to a new era of airplane airport games.Aeroplane wala game takes you to a whole new level of aeroplane simulator 3d games. It’s not just a regular aeroplane simulator game or airport flying parking game.

Feature:
Tap camera button to select from different camera views.
Tap Speed button to accelerate.
Tilt device to turn left and right.
Also use button controls to turn left and right.
Hit throttle to speed up and hit brake to stop.
